After 1,000 hours I have to change my review to say I no longer recommend the game. The entire map generation algorithm was reworked and you spend most of your time running into random objects. There are minimal pallets and windows on maps now and when they do exist (pallets in specific) they are mostly unsafe. Not to mention the fact that almost 80% of the time you will be hit through a window even though you've gotten through it and began running on the other side or hit through a pallet that you've already pulled down. These issues have existed for FOUR years and the developers have done nothing to fix them.
